attributes.title: Terrible Experience!!!!
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support our president. I cannot believe that our president would peddle such a useless app. When I tried to get sign up for events, the app would freeze. Trump 2020 ahaha jk...........unless😳

attributes.title: He’s gross
attributes.review: The app is just as awful as the man. Not only does it have his messed up ideas and quality’s but it glitches all the time absolutely ridiculous.

opened the app and the page was FULL of his PROFESSIONALLY SHOT NUDES.... absolutely revolting Mr. President. I REFUSE to stand by someone who has the audacity to take such photos, and I don’t mean the lewd kind, but those satin panties ARE NOT it. I really was going to vote for you but now I have no choice but to vote for Biden.

attributes.title: Terrible horrible no good
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It glitches constantly and the layout is terrible. Do not get this app unless you want a million viruses on your phone 🤢

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: Every time I go on the app it crashes my phone and I have to turn it on and off again, can’t use any of my other apps now

attributes.title: very mean trick😔💔
attributes.review: i thought this was a good app that was going to help me stay informed about the 2020 election however this was not the case. it turns out this was a prank app that scares you when you open it. i was looking for election updates and instead i saw a traumatizing image of a spray tanned crab with no shell and very small hands. 0/10 absolutely would not recommend. i almost peed myself! dont get this app😔😖😢🤧

attributes.title: trump what is this?
attributes.review: this app is horrible as a white supremisist trying to navigate this app is so hard because everything on the app isn’t white. Doesn’t this app know I carry? trump what is this??

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: I was very excited to get this app... but once downloaded it was very glitchy and my phone started to act weird. I do not suggest getting this app. I think it has a virus!
i am very disappointed in this app it took SOOO LONG to download and when it finally did the layout was really bad and confusing. This app isn’t so helpful yet actually not helpful at all!!!

attributes.title: Screw off liberal snowflakes.
attributes.review: Sleepy Joe doesn’t have a chance.
